meta.@content: AN/SSQ-62B/C/D/E Directional Command Activated Sonobuoy System (DICASS) Sonobuoy
NAVY TRAINING SYSTEM PLAN FOR THE NAVY CONSOLIDATED SONOBUOYS N88-NTSP-A-50-8910B/A SEPTEMBER 1998
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

ExternProtoDeclare.@appinfo: Produce wireframe or transparent beam hemisphere. Typical uses include sonar/radar/light beams. Negative range values invert base and apex at same relative location. Default: hemisphere with centroid at (0 0 0) and radius 1 atop x-z plane.

field.@appinfo: (communications) is transmitted signal in contact with receiver or (sensor) is a target return detected?
distance in meters along x axis
distance in meters used until eventIn range sent
whether wireframe beam is drawn
whether solid beam is drawn
rendering color when contact=true
rendering color when contact=false
1 = fully transparent wireframe only

ProtoDeclare.@appinfo: AN/SSQ-62B/C/D/E Directional Command Activated Sonobuoy System (DICASS) Sonobuoy

field.@appinfo: identifier label for this buoy
default value: AN/SSQ-62B
local surface coordinates X=North Z=East
local surface coordinates X=North Z=East
meters depth use negative numbers for subsurface
meters depth use negative numbers for subsurface
trigger event to bind/unbind viewpoint
local coordinates X=North Y=altitude Z=East
maximum audible sonar detection range meters
pingDuration corresponds to maxRange at 1500m/sec sound speed
in-water sound speed m/s, default value 1500
trigger event to start single ping
trigger event to start continuous ping sequence
Can add linkable text for further information
url for linkable text
target window for linkable text

-children.#comment: ViewpointControl initialize() updates description to include ID

TouchSensor.@description: click and hold to view sonobuoy data

-children.#comment: make text touchable at a distance, allows closeup viewing of DICASS and label data

@info: null node, no text at long range
null node, no text at long range

-children.#comment: Needed: time-delay prototype gated by distance and speed of sound through medium.

field.@appinfo: set Script to verbose mode by enabling console trace statements
set Script to verbose mode by enabling console trace statements

-children.#comment: maintain opaque until mid range, then go transparent to indicate active detection not feasible

field.@appinfo: pingDuration corresponds to maxRange at 1500m/sec sound speed
duration between successive pings is twice pingInterval
set Script to verbose mode by enabling console trace statements
